name: An abalone-shell circlet called 'The Extender'
data: It increases the users constitution impressively.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoints poorly.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It is a relic of the First Expedition.
Its power could be greatly enhanced through embedding.
